channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2023120587
item.description:
Report X-2023120587

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-05
  • City: UNIONDALE
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THREE X SIX OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF REEBOK COOL YOUR BODY AEROSOL DEODORANT BODY SPRAY. THE PACKAGE ALSO CONTAINS VARIOUS SIZES OF PERFUMERY PRODUCTS MEETING 173.150(G). THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER W027X0, QUALITY KING FRAGRANCE, 35 SAWGRASS DR. SUITE 2, BELLPORT NY 11713-1577.

item.title: Report E-2023120408
item.description:
Report E-2023120408

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-04
  • City: SYOSSET
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that due to a forklift puncture at the terminal, approximately 5 gallons of Zinsser BIN Primer Ultimate Sealer Stain Killer (Hazardous - UN1263) was released. The released product was contained to the trailer floor.The SDS was reviewed with the terminal and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS. The released product, damaged bucket, and oil-dri were placed into a 35-gallon poly drum and left onsite for the terminal to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023120568
item.description:
Report X-2023120568

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-17
  • City: YORKTOWN HGTS
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UNLOADER DISCOVERED A PACKAGE THAT WAS LEAKING. HE, STOPPED UNLOADING, LEFT AREA NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR. SUPERVISOR INFORMED RESPONDER ABOUT THE SPILL. RESPONDER BROUGHT HIS PPE AND APPROACHED THE TRAILER. HE DISCOVERED A WET BOX THAT HAD NOT CONTAMINATED ANY OTHER PACKAGES OR SPILLED ONTO THE FLOOR.
